sentence.text: Biallelic mutations in IRE1-mediated unfolded protein response cause a recessive form of Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS) characterized by progressive kyphoscoliosis, myopathy, and hearing loss.

We recently identified a 42-year-old man with severe kyphoscoliosis, restrictive/obstructive lung disease, short stature, mild hearing loss, decreased muscle cell adhesion mediated by integrin, and a dissection of the celiac artery at age 41.
